summary: This document is the Fifth Amendment to the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2001 Trust, detailing amendments made to the trust, including the forgiveness of debts owed to Epstein by various individuals. The amendment was executed by Jeffrey E. Epstein in New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the Grantor of the trust and executed the Fifth Amendment.

persons.name: Jean-Luc Brunel
persons.context: Jean-Luc Brunel is listed as one of the individuals whose debts to Epstein are forgiven.

keyFacts: The document is a Fifth Amendment to the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2001 Trust.
The amendment includes the forgiveness of debts owed to Epstein by multiple individuals.
The amendment was executed by Jeffrey E. Epstein on September 11, 2007.
